metadata.title: Application Whitelisting per User
metadata.description: This control enforces application whitelisting for each user on the system, ensuring that only approved applications can be executed.

control-objective.text: Ensure that only approved applications are executed on the system

control-enhancements.text: Implement application whitelisting per user account

control-assertions.text: All executed applications are approved by the system administrator

control-parameters.name: Whitelist
control-parameters.description: A list of approved applications that can be executed by each user

control.supplemental-guidance: Administrators should regularly review the whitelist to ensure it remains up-to-date and that it includes only approved applications.

references.title: NIST Cybersecurity Framework: Application Security Focused Risk Management
